casebody.data:
DURHAM LAND OWNERS
v.
DURHAM COUNTY. No. 343P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 15, 2006. Henry C. Fordham, Jr., Apex, for Durham County Land Owners, et al. Grayson Kelley, Senior Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of June 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of June 2006."
